import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './MeetingRegistrationModal.css'; interface MeetingRegistrationModalProps { isOpen: boolean; onClose: () => void; onSave: (meetingData: any) => void; } const MeetingRegistrationModal: React.FC = ({ isOpen, onClose, onSave }) => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ // 기본 정보 meetingName: '', meetingDate: '', startTime: '', endTime: '', location: '', creator: '', attendees: '', webexLink: 'https://example.webex.com/meet/...', progressStatus: '예정', // 아젠다 정보 agendaTitle: '', agendaContent: '', isRecording: false }); const handleInputChange = (field: string, value: string) => { setFormData(prev => ({ ...prev, [field]: value })); }; const handleSave = () => { onSave(formData); onClose(); }; const handleRecordingToggle = () => { setFormData(prev => ({ ...prev, isRecording: !prev.isRecording })); }; if (!isOpen) return null; return (
새 회의 등록
{/* 회의 기본 정보 입력 섹션 */}
handleInputChange('meetingName', e.target.value)} />
handleInputChange('meetingDate', e.target.value)} />
handleInputChange('startTime', e.target.value)} />
handleInputChange('endTime', e.target.value)} />
handleInputChange('location', e.target.value)} />
handleInputChange('creator', e.target.value)} />
